Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion at sub-nanometer scale with selective adsorption effects

Experimental Validation.Method: Single gas permeation experiments using a home-made device, binary gas separation tests using Gas chromatograph SP-6890

Other Information.Additional Info: The ZIF-8 membrane was synthesized on silicon nitride hollow fibers via a one-step hydrothermal method. The membrane exhibited strong CO2 adsorption and low CO2 permeance, making it suitable for CO2 separation from gas mixtures.
